==Japanese==

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|ぼう|げつ}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=ぼうげつ}} compound {{m|zh|望月|tr=mjang ngjwot|lit=to view from a distance + moon}}, possibly from the way the moon is most easily observed when full.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|ぼうげつ|dev=4|acc=1|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ぼうげつ|hhira=ばうげつ}}

# [[full moon]]
# in the [[lunar calendar]], the [[fifteenth]] night of a lunar [[month]], the night of the [[full moon]]

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|もち|つき|k2=づき}}
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=もちづき|望|tr1=mochi|月|tr2=tsuki|t2=moon}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref> The ''mochi'' element is of uncertain derivation. It probably derives from the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of verb {{m|ja|持つ|tr=motsu||to have, to possess; to keep, to maintain}}, but the semantic relationship remains unclear. {{rendaku2|sort=もちづき|tsuki|zuki}}

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|もちづき|dev=4|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|もちづき}}

# [[full moon]]
# in the [[lunar calendar]], the [[fifteenth]] night of a lunar [[month]], the night of the [[full moon]]
# more specifically, the [[fifteenth]] night of the eighth lunar [[month]], the [[full moon]] of mid-[[autumn]]

=====Synonyms=====
* {{sense|full moon}} {{ja-r|満月|まんげつ}}

====Proper noun====
{{ja-pos|もちづき|proper}}

# {{surname|lang=ja|sort=もちづき}}
